title: 我恐怕不喜欢奶酪。
answer: I'm afraid I don't like cheese.

title: 我来拿糖吧?
answer: Shall I get the sugar?

title: 你的比萨饼看上去很不错!
answer: Your pizza looks so nice.

title: 好香的味道啊!
answer: What a delicious smell!

title: 你想要尝一些吗?
answer: Would you like to try some?

title: 很好,每样尝起来都这么甜!
answer: Good, everything tastes so sweet!

title: 它们尝起来确实很甜,中间感觉软软的。
answer: They taste really sweet and they feel soft in the middle.

title: 嗯，我的巧克力饼干做好了。
answer: Well, my chocolate cookies are done now.

title: 我个子很高,留着金色短发,戴着眼镜。
answer: I'm quite tall, with short fair hair, and l3 enjoy sports as wear glasses.

title: 收到你的来信真是太好了,我迫不及待想要见你。
answer: It was great to hear from you, and I can't wait to meet you.

title: 我还喜欢运动,特别是网球。
answer: I enjoy sports as well, especially tennis.

title: 当到达机场时,我希望你能通过我的照片认出我来。
answer: I hope you will know me from my photo when I arrive at the airport.

title: 我花许多时间和我的朋友们在学校弹奏古典音乐,但是我也喜欢舞曲--我爱跳舞!
answer: I spend a lot of time playing classical music with my friends at school, but l also like dance music-I love dancing!

title: 他擅长每件事情，但我却不这样。
answer: He's good at everything, but I'm not.

title: 我有你的照片--你看上去很漂亮。我确信我们会找到彼此!
answer: I've got your photo you look very pretty. I'm sure we'll find each other!

title: 但是我没法表达对去中国的兴奋之情!
answer: But I can't tell you how excited I am about going to China!

title: 这次旅行我将穿牛仔裤和丅恤衫，但我也会带上暖和的外套。
answer: I'll wear jeans and a T-shirt for the journey, but I'll also carry my warm coat.

title: 嗯,当要离开爸爸妈妈几天时,起初我经常会感到有点儿难过，并且当和陌生人在一起时,我十分害羞。
answer: Well, I often feel a bit sad at first when I leave my mum and dad for a few days, and I'm quite shy when I'm with strangers.

title: 我说汉语的时候会感到紧张……
answer: I feel nervous when l speak Chinese …

title: 谢谢你上次的电子邮件。
answer: Thanks for your last message.

title: 谢谢你告诉我你的爱好。你(的爱好)和我非常相似!
answer: Thanks for telling me about your hobbies. You sound just like me!

title: 有时我在学校成绩不佳，我感到伤心。我应该更加努力学习。
answer: Sometimes I get bad marks at school, and I feel sad. I should work harder.

title: 当我不知道如何正确处理事情时我总是很难过,所以在中国和你一起时请帮助我!
answer: I'm always sorry when I don't know how to do things in the right way, so please help me when I'm with you in China!

title: 她在英语家庭作业方面向我寻求帮助，因为我擅长英语。
answer: She asked me to help her with her English homework because I am good at English.
